Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientGameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientGameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientUpdateListener, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cli, GuiManager
public abstract class ClientGameManager extends Object implements ClientUpdateListener, Runnable
This class represents the client game manager

    • createConnection

      public void createConnection(int connection, String username, String address, int port, DisconnectionListener disconnectionListener) throws Exception
      Method used to create a connection with the server
      Parameters:
      connection - can be 0 if the user choose a socket connection or 1 if the user choose a RMI connection
      username - is the chosen username
      address - is the server address
      port - is the server port
      disconnectionListener - is the listener of client disconnection
      Throws:
      Exception - can throw an exception if the connection can't be created
